9.4 DUIM-Frames Module

display-progress-note

Generic function

Summary

Displays the specified progress note.

Signature

display-progress-note framem progress-note => ()

Arguments

framem
An instance of type <frame-manager>.

progress-note
An instance of type <progress-note>.

Values

None

Library

duim-frames

Module

duim-frames

Description

Displays the specified progress-note in the frame managed by framem.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
